content.question: A wire loop with width <math alttext="w" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>w</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and height <math alttext="h" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>h</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is in a magnetic field that is directed into the page, as shown in the figure above. The magnitude <math alttext="B" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the magnetic field changes with time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> . The magnitude of the resulting induced <math alttext="e m f " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>emf</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> in the wire loop is given as a function of time by the equation <math alttext="E m f equals beta h w t cubed" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>ε</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>β</mi><mi>h</mi><mi>w</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> , where <math alttext="beta " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>β</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a positive constant in units of <math alttext="Tesla per seconds to the fourth power " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mrow><mtext>T</mtext><mo>/</mo><mrow><msup><mrow><mtext>s</mtext></mrow><mrow><mtext>4</mtext></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following is a possible expression for the magnitude of the magnetic field?

choices.label: <math alttext="3 beta t to the fourth power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>β</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 h w beta t squared " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>h</mi><mi>w</mi><mi>β</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one fourth h w beta to the fourth power" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>h</mi><mi>w</mi><mi>β</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one fourth beta t to the fourth power " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>β</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one fourth beta t to the fourth power " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac><mi>β</mi><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
